arabic: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِ أَنْ أَنذِرْ قَوْمَكَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
english: Surely, We sent Nuh (Noah) to his people: ‘Warn your people before a painful torment comes upon them.’

arabic: قَالَ يَا قَوْمِ إِنِّي لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
english: He said: ‘O my people! Indeed, I am a clear Warner to you,

arabic: أَنِ اعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ وَاتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ
english: That you must worship Allah and fear Him and obey me.

arabic: يَغْفِرْ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ اللَّهِ إِذَا جَاءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ ۖ لَوْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
english: He will forgive your sins and will give you respite till an appointed term. Surely, when (the appointed) time of Allah comes, then respite is not given if only you knew.’

arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوْتُ قَوْمِي لَيْلًا وَنَهَارًا
english: Nuh (Noah) submitted: ‘O my Lord! Indeed, I kept calling my people night and day,

arabic: فَلَمْ يَزِدْهُمْ دُعَائِي إِلَّا فِرَارًا
english: But my calling did no good except making them flee away.

arabic: وَإِنِّي كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَلُوا أَصَابِعَهُمْ فِي آذَانِهِمْ وَاسْتَغْشَوْا ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّوا وَاسْتَكْبَرُوا اسْتِكْبَارًا
english: And every time I called them (towards faith) so that You might forgive them, they only thrust their fingers into their ears and wrapped their clothes over themselves and stuck obstinately (to disbelief) and behaved most arrogantly.

arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّي دَعَوْتُهُمْ جِهَارًا
english: Then I called them aloud.

arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّي أَعْلَنتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًا
english: Then I advised them publicly and privately and secretly (as well).

arabic: فَقُلْتُ اسْتَغْفِرُوا رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُ كَانَ غَفَّارًا
english: Then I said: ‘Seek forgiveness from your Lord. Surely, He is Most Forgiving.

arabic: يُرْسِلِ السَّمَاءَ عَلَيْكُم مِّدْرَارًا
english: He will send down on you torrents of rain,

arabic: وَيُمْدِدْكُم بِأَمْوَالٍ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ جَنَّاتٍ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ أَنْهَارًا
english: And will help you with wealth and sons and will grow for you gardens and will make streams flow for you.

arabic: مَّا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًا
english: What is the matter with you that you do not have faith in, or the gnosis of, Allah’s Majesty,

arabic: وَقَدْ خَلَقَكُمْ أَطْوَارًا
english: Whereas He has created you through diverse conditions?

arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا كَيْفَ خَلَقَ اللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَاوَاتٍ طِبَاقًا
english: Have you not seen how Allah has created seven (or many) heavenly spheres corresponding to one another (layer upon layer)?

arabic: وَجَعَلَ الْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًا وَجَعَلَ الشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًا
english: And He brightened in them the moon and made the sun a radiant lamp (i.e., the source of light and heat).

arabic: وَاللَّهُ أَنبَتَكُم مِّنَ الْأَرْضِ نَبَاتًا
english: And Allah has caused you to grow like vegetation from the earth.*

arabic: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمْ فِيهَا وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ إِخْرَاجًا
english: Then He will return you into the same (earth) and will then bring you forth (from the same again).

arabic: وَاللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًا
english: And Allah has made the earth a vast expanse for you,

arabic: لِّتَسْلُكُوا مِنْهَا سُبُلًا فِجَاجًا
english: So that you may move around through its broad ways.’

arabic: قَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمْ عَصَوْنِي وَاتَّبَعُوا مَن لَّمْ يَزِدْهُ مَالُهُ وَوَلَدُهُ إِلَّا خَسَارًا
english: Nuh (Noah) submitted: ‘O my Lord! They have disobeyed me and kept following that (class of the rebellious rich) whose wealth and children have not increased for them anything but loss.

arabic: وَمَكَرُوا مَكْرًا كُبَّارًا
english: And they kept perpetrating huge frauds (to keep the common man in error).

arabic: وَقَالُوا لَا تَذَرُنَّ آلِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّا وَلَا سُوَاعًا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًا
english: And they kept saying: Do not turn away from your gods and never abandon (the idols named as) Wadd, Suwa‘, Yaghuth, Ya‘uq and Nasr (as well).

arabic: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا كَثِيرًا ۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ الظَّالِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَالًا
english: And truly, they have misled many people. So, (O my Lord,) do not increase these wrongdoers (in anything) except misguidance.’

arabic: مِّمَّا خَطِيئَاتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا فَأُدْخِلُوا نَارًا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا لَهُم مِّن دُونِ اللَّهِ أَنصَارًا
english: (In the end) they were drowned due to their sins and then flung into Fire. So they could not find any helper for themselves against Allah.

arabic: وَقَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى الْأَرْضِ مِنَ الْكَافِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
english: And Nuh (Noah) submitted: ‘O my Lord! Do not leave even a single disbeliever living on earth.

arabic: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّوا عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوا إِلَّا فَاجِرًا كَفَّارًا
english: Surely, if You leave them (alive), they will keep leading your servants astray and will beget none but the most wicked and extremely disbelieving children.

arabic: رَّبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيْتِيَ مُؤْمِنًا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ الظَّالِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًا
english: O my Lord! Forgive me and my parents and everyone who enters my home as a believer and (all) the believing men and the believing women, and do not increase anything for the wrongdoers except destruction.’
